name: John BOYCE, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Boyce v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: John BOYCE, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of September, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
957 A.2d 230
John BOYCE, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.
No. 80 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 24, 2008.
